# acutilsLite

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A simplified and soon-to-be tested and documented version of acutils. Provides functions for working with the json databases. 

The package can be installed with:
``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("acorg/acutilsLite")
```
